item.title: LeetCode[181] Employees Earning More Than Their Managers
item.description: Question The Employee table holds all employees including their managers. Every employee has an Id, and there is also a column for the manager Id. +----+-------+--------+-----------+ | Id | Name | Salary | ManagerId | +----+-------+--------+-----------+ | 1 | Joe | 70000 | 3 | | 2 | Henry | 80000 | 4 | | 3 | Sam | 60000 | NULL | | 4 | Max | 90000 | NULL | +----+-------+--------+-----------+ Given the Employee table, write a SQL query that finds out employees who earn more than their managers.
